attributes.action: Remain inpost as YOU were elected as Prime Minister, the country didnt vote for half a job to be done, they voted for you!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would prefer Tony Blair to finish the job he started as PM, not hand over the baton to Gordon Brown or any other member of the Labour party. If he wants to stand down then a General Election should be called, that way the country who he is meant to represent can elect the next leader of this Great Nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
